title: why does it take (4) four hours to download my emails from gmail, and if I interrupt, they are blank.
content: if I click on an email before all emails are downloaded, which takes about four !!! hours, the emails are totally blank, or a bunch of totally weird letters and symbols and numbers.
creator: akwhinston

title: Email not working since update yesterday
content:
Since my Thunderbird email account was updated yesterday I have been unable to send or receive emails. The message that pops up says -! "unable to write the email to the mailbox. Make sure the file system allows you to write privileges and you have enough disk space to copy the mail box." 

I'm not tech savvy enough to understand how to follow instructions to try to restore it, could someone please help.

Fortunately I have a Smart phone that is still receiving emails.
creator: pauline_watson

title: How do I get back to the pre version 115.3.1 look and feel of thunderbird?
content: How do I get back to the pre version 115.3.1 look and feel of Thunderbird?

title: Thunderbird
content:
Had my Thunderbird email on my laptop (LT). It goes back to 3/24/2022. - 

LT crashed Sept 18 2003. -  Hardware issues went to DELL for repairs   -

Created Thunderbird email accounts on my Desktop (DT) on Sept 18 2023. - got all emails from 18 Sept 2023 to now on DT -

Got LT back 9 Oct 2023. - Recovered my LT Thunderbird emails from Acronis backups all the way back to 3/24/2022

Want to merge what was on my LT before Sept 18 2023 and what is on my DT since sept 18 together on my LT.

Is this possible?

Thanks in advance.
creator: floyd6789

title: Since new update thunderbird keeps contacting office 265, how do you make that stop
content: every time i open a different email in thunderbird since latest update it wants to login to office365 how to stop that, super super annoying
